txt.en: 'Would you like to be flagged as having completed Volume IV Books 5 and 6 of the Epic quest series? If so, speak to me again!
'You know how this works now, right? I'm sure you do! Completion of this quest will flag you as having completed Volume IV Books 5 and 6 of the Epic quest, as well as the Wrath and Ruin quest chain.'
Level Up: Volume IV: Books 5 and 6
Completion of this quest will flag your character as having completed all the quests in Books 5 and 6 of the Epic quest series of Volume IV, as well as the Wrath and Ruin quest chain.
Talk to Istien to complete Volume IV, Books 5 and 6!
